column5: This programme gives you the skills to work with media and communication in international developmental cooperation as well as in other areas.This is a half-time study programme, combining courses on culture, communication and development and integrating them with practical field work. It explores the use of communication - both as a tool and as a way of expressing processes of social change - within the contexts of globalisation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
